game.name: Hookah Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Start with a small cozy hookah lounge and turn it into the most popular spot in the city! Your goal is to craft perfect hookahs, satisfying even the most demanding customers.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Start with a small cozy hookah lounge and turn it into the most popular spot in the city! Your goal is to craft perfect hookahs, satisfying even the most demanding customers.
